paragraph: Adler, Kurt, pianist and conductor; b. Neuhaus, Czechoslovakia, March 1, 1907. He was educated in Vienna; studied musicology with Guido Adler and Robert Lach at the Vienna Univ. ; was assistant conductor of the Berlin State Opera (1927of the German Opera in Prague (1929In 1933, with the advent of the Nazis to power, he went to Russia, where he was chief conductor at the Kiev State Opera (1933Philh. Orch. of Stalingrad (19351938 he came to the U.S.; first appeared as concert pianist; then conducted in Canada and Mexico.
